title: The openat syscall test step
description: The openat syscall test step runs the openat system call with the provided arguments

dirFd.description: The file descriptor referring the directory containing the 'pathname'

pathname.description: The path that must be opened. If it is relative, it is interpreted relative to the directory referred to by 'dirFd'

flags.description: The openat flags, expressed as an OR-ed combination of the supported flags or as integer

mode.description: The openat mode, expressed as an OR-ed combination of the supported modes or as integer
